docs: The Lazor Kit program provides smart wallet functionality with passkey authentication

docs: Authorize ephemeral execution for temporary program access

docs: New ephemeral authorization account (rent payer: payer)

docs: Policy program for optional policy enforcement at session creation

docs: New transaction session account (rent payer: payer)

docs: Create a new smart wallet with passkey authentication

docs: Program configuration

docs: Ephemeral authorization to execute. Closed on success to refund rent.

docs: The current authority of the program.

docs: System program

accounts.name: ix_sysvar
docs: CHECK

errors.name: PasskeyMismatch
errors.msg: Passkey public key mismatch with stored authenticator

errors.name: SmartWalletDataMismatch
errors.msg: Smart wallet address mismatch with authenticator

errors.name: AuthenticatorNotFound
errors.msg: Smart wallet authenticator account not found or invalid

errors.name: Secp256r1InvalidLength
errors.msg: Secp256r1 instruction has invalid data length

errors.name: Secp256r1InstructionNotFound
errors.msg: Secp256r1 instruction not found at specified index

errors.name: InvalidSignature
errors.msg: Invalid signature provided for passkey verification

errors.name: ClientDataInvalidUtf8
errors.msg: Client data JSON is not valid UTF-8

errors.name: ChallengeMissing
errors.msg: Challenge field missing from client data JSON

errors.name: TimestampTooOld
errors.msg: Message timestamp is too far in the past

errors.name: TimestampTooNew
errors.msg: Message timestamp is too far in the future

errors.name: PolicyProgramNotRegistered
errors.msg: Policy program not found in registry

errors.name: WhitelistFull
errors.msg: The policy program registry is full.

errors.name: PolicyDataRequired
errors.msg: Policy data is required but not provided

errors.name: PolicyProgramsIdentical
errors.msg: Old and new policy programs are identical

errors.name: NoDefaultPolicyProgram
errors.msg: Neither old nor new policy program is the default

errors.name: CpiDataMissing
errors.msg: CPI data is required but not provided

errors.name: InvalidCpiData
errors.msg: CPI data is invalid or malformed

errors.name: InsufficientPolicyAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient remaining accounts for policy instruction

errors.name: InsufficientCpiAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient remaining accounts for CPI instruction

errors.name: AccountSliceOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Account slice index out of bounds

errors.name: SolTransferInsufficientAccounts
errors.msg: SOL transfer requires at least 2 remaining accounts

errors.name: NewWalletDeviceMissing
errors.msg: New authenticator account is required but not provided

errors.name: NewWalletDevicePasskeyMissing
errors.msg: New authenticator passkey is required but not provided

errors.name: TransferAmountOverflow
errors.msg: Transfer amount would cause arithmetic overflow

errors.name: InvalidBumpSeed
errors.msg: Invalid bump seed for PDA derivation

errors.name: CredentialIdTooLarge
errors.msg: Credential ID exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.name: PolicyDataTooLarge
errors.msg: Policy data exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.name: CpiDataTooLarge
errors.msg: CPI data exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.name: VaultNotFound
errors.msg: Vault not found for the specified mint

types.name: EphemeralAuthorization
docs: Ephemeral authorization for temporary program access.
Created after passkey authentication. Allows execution with ephemeral key
for a limited time to authorized programs with multiple instructions.

fields.name: owner_wallet_address
docs: Smart wallet that authorized this session

fields.name: ephemeral_public_key
docs: Ephemeral public key that can sign transactions

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix timestamp when this session expires

fields.name: fee_payer_address
docs: Fee payer for transactions in this session

fields.name: rent_refund_address
docs: Where to refund rent when closing the session

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Vault index for fee collection

fields.name: instruction_data_hash
docs: Combined hash of all instruction data that can be executed

fields.name: accounts_metadata_hash
docs: Combined hash of all accounts that will be used

types.name: PolicyProgramRegistry
docs: Registry of approved policy programs that can govern smart wallet operations

fields.name: registered_programs
docs: List of registered policy program addresses

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation

types.name: SmartWalletData
docs: Data account for a smart wallet

fields.name: wallet_id
docs: Unique identifier for this smart wallet

fields.name: referral_address
docs: Referral address that governs this wallet's operations

fields.name: policy_program_id
docs: Policy program that governs this wallet's operations

fields.name: last_nonce
docs: Last nonce used for message verification

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation

types.name: TransactionSession
docs: Transaction session for deferred execution.
Created after full passkey + policy verification. Contains all bindings
necessary to execute the transaction later without re-verification.

fields.name: owner_wallet_address
docs: Smart wallet that authorized this session

fields.name: instruction_data_hash
docs: Combined sha256 hash of all transaction instruction data

fields.name: accounts_metadata_hash
docs: Combined sha256 hash over all ordered remaining account metas plus target programs

fields.name: authorized_nonce
docs: The nonce that was authorized at session creation (bound into data hash)

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix expiration timestamp

fields.name: rent_refund_address
docs: Where to refund rent when closing the session

fields.name: vault_index
docs: Vault index for fee collection

types.name: WalletDevice
docs: Account that stores a wallet device (passkey) used to authenticate to a smart wallet

fields.name: passkey_public_key
docs: The public key of the passkey for this wallet device that can authorize transactions

fields.name: smart_wallet_address
docs: The smart wallet this wallet device belongs to

fields.name: credential_id
docs: The credential ID this wallet device belongs to

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation
